title: Statement from the President on the Election of Scott Murphy to Congress | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




April 24, 2009

 



Statement from the President on the Election of Scott Murphy to Congress




THE WHITE HOUSE   Office of the Press Secretary  ____________________________________________________________________  FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE                                            April 24, 2009  Statement from the President on the Election of Scott Murphy to Congress   I want to extend my heartfelt congratulations to Congressman-elect Scott Murphy for his victory in New York's 20th Congressional District. With this hard fought win, Scott has shown he is willing to fight the tough battles on behalf of the people in his district.   As a candidate, Scott courageously championed the economic plans we need to lift our nation and put it on a better path, and he will continue to do so in Congress.  With his proven record of creating high paying jobs and standing up for Upstate New York, Scott will bring to the nation’s capitol the change New Yorkers need.
